Package com.salesforce.multicloudj.sts.driver

Class AbstractSts

java.lang.Object
com.salesforce.multicloudj.sts.driver.AbstractSts
All Implemented Interfaces:
Provider
public abstract class AbstractSts extends Object implements Provider
Abstract base class for Security Token Service (STS) implementations. This class is internal for SDK and all the providers for STS implementations are supposed to implement it.
